content.text: Apply Default Container System to All Documentation Pages
Task: Update all documentation pages and other remaining pages to use the standard apiary-container system for consistency across the entire application.
Scope:
All files in /Documentation/ directory that currently use documentation-container
Any remaining pages that use custom container classes
Remove all custom CSS that duplicates functionality now provided by base-containers.css
Requirements:
Replace documentation-container with apiary-container
Add proper apiary-header with icons and context information
Convert custom info boxes to standard alert classes
Update buttons to use standard btn classes
Remove all duplicate CSS styles
Maintain existing functionality and content structure
Follow the established naming conventions and file structure
Files to Update:
/Documentation/error.tt (clean up duplicate content)
Any remaining documentation files with custom containers
Theme editor pages
API credentials pages
Any other pages found with custom container classes
Expected Outcome: All pages will have consistent styling using the universal container system, reducing code duplication and ensuring a cohesive user experience across the application.
